==== Mouse codes ====
LWJGL supports a maximum of 16 mouse buttons.{{verify|according to MC-266231, even the modern game only supports up to button 8. there were issues with binding that caused some buttons to be interpreted as higher than they were, but GLFW only seems to support eight mouse buttons.}} The Minecraft game settings screen translates button 0 to "Button 1", button 1 to "Button 2", et cetera.
